name: Adbot
tag_list: digital-advertising, branding, social-media-marketing, facebook-advertising, google-advertising, linkedin-advertising, email-marketing
overview:
Adbot is the leader in managing large scale digital ads, social media marketing and online marketing campaigns.

Adbot is awarded as the most creative and innovative ad agency creating ads having quick viewer attention and prolonged imprints on viewers mind.

Adbot has the technology and brain to make your brand number one. Specifically, we make your brand number one for exact searches only, to penetrate your target audience deeper awarding better conversion rates. We create performing ads by acting as the intersection point among your brand, ad servers, and audience and re-target the hottest leads for your business again and again. We create ads with quick viewer attention and prolonged market imprints.

We make every single ad impression and click count. Our spectacular ad optimization technique awards us with higher ad quality score and top ad placement. We create ads for conversions not for just clicks and that is the reason why we easily provide our clients with overwhelming ROI. Even our best performing ads fall under the radar of periodical review and optimization to seek any further improvement possibility.
